SEARCH
Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller.RecipeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${app.endpoint.recipes}") @Validated public class RecipeController extends Object
REST controller for managing recipes. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on recipes.

Annotations: - @AllArgsConstructor: Generates a constructor with 1 parameter for each field in the class. - @RestController: Indicates that this class is a REST controller. - @RequestMapping: Specifies the base URL for all endpoints in this controller. - @Validated: Enables validation for the controller.

Methods: - getAllRecipes(String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves all recipes with pagination. - getRecipesByNameContaining(String name, String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves recipes by name containing a string with pagination. - searchRecipesByIngredients(List ingredients, String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves recipes containing any of the specified ingredients with pagination. - searchRecipesByAllIngredients(List ingredients, String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves recipes containing all of the specified ingredients with pagination. - getRecipeById(String id): Retrieves a recipe by its ID. - getRecipesByIds(List ids): Retrieves recipes by a list of IDs. - getRecipeByName(String name): Retrieves a recipe by its name, case insensitive. - createRecipe(RecipeDto recipeDto): Creates a new recipe. - createRecipes(Flux recipes): Creates multiple recipes. - deleteRecipeById(String id): Deletes a recipe by its ID. - deleteAllRecipes(): Deletes all recipes.

See Also:

    • getAllRecipes

      @GetMapping public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<RecipeDto>> getAllRecipes(@RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves all recipes with pagination.
      Parameters:
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of RecipeDto objects.

    • getRecipesByNameContaining

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.by-name}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<RecipeDto>> getRecipesByNameContaining(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves recipes by name containing a string with pagination.
      Parameters:
      name - The string to search for within recipe names.
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of RecipeDto objects.

    • searchRecipesByIngredients

      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.

      A Mono emitting a Page of RecipeDto objects.

    • getRecipeById

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.id.path-variable-id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RecipeDto> getRecipeById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a recipe by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the recipe to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting the RecipeDto object, or an error if not found.

    • getRecipesByIds

      @PostMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.by-ids}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Map<String,Object>> getRecipesByIds(@RequestBody List<String> ids)
      Retrieves recipes by a list of IDs.
      Parameters:
      ids - The list of IDs of the recipes to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a map containing found recipes and not found IDs.

    • getRecipeByName

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.name.path-variable-name}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RecipeDto> getRecipeByName(@PathVariable String name)
      Retrieves a recipe by its name, case insensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting the RecipeDto object, or an error if not found.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • createRecipes

      @PostMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.bulk}") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<RecipeDto> createRecipes(@RequestBody reactor.core.publisher.Flux<RecipeDto> recipes)
      Creates multiple recipes.
      Parameters:
      recipes - The flux of recipes to create.
      Returns:
      A Flux emitting the created RecipeDto objects.

    • deleteRecipeById

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.path-variable-id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> deleteRecipeById(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a recipe by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the recipe to delete.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a message indicating the recipe has been deleted, or an error if not found.

    • deleteAllRecipes

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.all}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> deleteAllRecipes()
      Deletes all recipes.
      Returns:
      A Mono indicating completion of the deletion process.
